channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours

item.title: [+3147] Official New BP Logo [Pic]
[+3043] "Yes, this is an actual PC Game Screenshot"
[+2774] Gary Coleman Dead At 42
item.description: Gary Coleman has died at 42, RadarOnline.com has learned. Coleman had been hospitalized in Provo, Utah since Wednesday, May 26, after suffering what his family called "a serious medical problem." PHOTOS: Gary Coleman Through The Years DNP

item.title: [+1970] Tron Guy? No, Tron Girls [pic]
item.description: You guys can ride my lightcycle any time.

item.title: [+1500] LOST In 3 Minutes
item.description: Everyone's talking about it, few people seem to understand it - but I do, so I thought I'd help you out!

item.title: [+1415] How The U.S. Government Killed The Safest Car Ever Built
item.description: Thirty-five years ago, the U.S. government built a fleet of cars that were safer than anything on the road. Twenty-five years ago, the government shredded them in secret. Two escaped the crusher. This is their story.

item.title: [+1077] Stem-Cell Dental Implants Grow New Teeth Right In Your Mouth
item.description: Although dental implants are available, the healing process can take months on end, and implants that fail to align with the ever-growing jawbone tend to fall out. According to a study published in the latest Journal of Dental Research, a new tissue regeneration technique may allow people to simply regrow a new set of pearly whites.

item.title: [+881] Victoria's Secret (COMIC)
item.description: He discovered Victoria's secret the hard way.

item.title: [+824] Mad Scientists Are Actually Just Mad Engineers (comic)
item.description: by Sanjay Kulkarni of Cowbirds in Love

item.title: [+785] Why Is A White Actor Playing "Prince Of Persia"?
item.description: Jake Gyllenhaal will star as Prince Dastan in "Prince of Persia", a casting choice that has upset some people: Gyllenhaal is white, while some feel the role calls for an actor of Middle Eastern descent.

item.title: [+781] Why Throw Out A Perfectly Good Obsolete Laptop? (pic)
[+767] Firefox Announces iPhone App
item.description: Upcoming app, called Firefox Home, will let you access data from your desktop Firefox browser on your iPhone.

item.title: [+668] Top 10 Upcoming Movies That We Hope Won't Suck
item.description: Here is our short list of movies coming out that we think stand a chance at being a box office success. Do you agree?

item.title: [+663] Why Open Source Makes Sense: Scientifically Proven
item.description: When the task at hand is a mundane and a repetitive task, money is a perfect incentive. However, when the task requires “rudimentary cognitive” skills, money, it turns out, isn’t the best incentive. This makes perfect sense when we look at the amazing open source projects out there.

item.title: [+647] LAPD Blurs Man Boobs On Mug Shot (PHOTO)
item.description: According to the LAPD, this man is armed and dangerous. And apparently has man boobs so appalling that they're not fit for public viewing.

item.title: [+626] 10 Reasons Why Being a Fat Guy is Awesome
item.description: People are always talking about the "epidemic" of poor nutrition among today's youth and America's obesity "problem." It's almost like they think being a big, fat person is somehow less than totally awesome. Well, I'm a fat guy, and I'm here to tell you, don't knock it till you've tried it.

item.title: [+615] 10 Very Controversial Billboards (PICS)
item.description: We’re all used to unusual ads these days, no matter what the medium. But once in a while, something is so bizarre, so hilarious or just plain insulting, we can’t help but do a double take. Whether it’s PETA making obesity jokes or a mistress exposing her affair with a married man, check out the 10 most outrageous billboards we could find.

item.title: [+583] Blizzard Confirms No LAN Play; Region Lock in Starcraft 2
item.description: Blizzard's VP of game design Frank Pearce has revealed that the only way to play Starcraft 2 in multiplayer will be through the company's Battle.net service online.This confirms that there will not only not be LAN capabilities within Starcraft 2, but that players are forced to play each other within their own regions.

item.title: [+581] Exclusive Video And Screenshots Of Digg Version 4
item.description: Details on the new DIgg Version 4.

item.title: [+574] These cats wish they had no lives [PIC]
item.description: Sometimes a picture isn't worth a thousand words.
